typeSystemDescription.name: julie-mmax-types
typeSystemDescription.description: The type system contains types for the import of MMAX annotations.

featureDescription.name: isContinuous
featureDescription.description: Tells if the MMAX annotation is continuous (true) or discontinuous (false). Could be also detected by checking if segmentList has length = 1.

featureDescription.name: segmentList
featureDescription.description: List of MMAX annotation segements that make up the MMAX annotation.

featureDescription.name: attributeList
featureDescription.description: List of attributes of the MMAX annotation.

featureDescription.name: pointerList
featureDescription.description: The list of MMAX pointers of the MMAX annotation.

featureDescription.name: adaptedCoveredText
featureDescription.description: Text covered by the annotation. This feature is helpful if the annotations is discontinuous...

featureDescription.name: id
featureDescription.description: Original markable id from MMAX2 tool. Unique only on a given annotation level.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.mmax.AnnotationSegment
typeDescription.description: Annotation segment of an MMAX annotation. Helps to represent discontinuous annotations.

featureDescription.name: id
featureDescription.description: Number of the segment. First segment has number 1.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jules.types.mmax.MMAXPointer
typeDescription.description: MMAX pointers specify a relation between two MMAX annotations.

featureDescription.name: targetList
featureDescription.description: The MMAX annotations the pointer points at.
